attributes.action: filter traffic lights at barnhill road
attributes.additional_details: The A82,  has been frequently regarded as one of the most dangerous roads in Scotland with multiple crashes
attributes.background: filter traffic lights for resident to leave the junction safely

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
